title: Parmesan Baked Potatoes
directions: Pour butter into a 13-in. x 9-in. baking pan. Sprinkle Parmesan cheese over butter. Place potatoes with cut sides down over cheese. Bake, uncovered, at 400Â° for 40-45 minutes or until tender. Yield: 8 servings.
ingredients: 8 medium unpeeled red potatoes (about 2-3/4 pounds), halved lengthwise
